effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
